title: "GG WP, Even though Our Support did nothing but Ward"
body:
lol thats a new one.

Support Hype.

replies.body:
> did nothing but Ward

honored.

I wish more supports did nothing but ward. Seriously, so many more games could be won.

Instead they want to play that Akali 'Support' who starts Doran's, steals every CS, and comes back after the first base with a Needlessly Large Rod instead of a Sightstone and boots. Then goes 0/13/0 and bitches that her team sucks.

Right Akali, it's our fault you tower dived the Alistar/Vayne as soon as you hit 6, and everytime you came back to lane. All our fault, clearly.

Even cheese supports like Nidalee, Xerath, Heimerdinger, and Vel'koz should buy sightstones.

Sightstones on people like junglers in ranked are also purchased.

Everyone should always be using their trinket + a pink ward at the least. That way most of the map will be covered on top of the sightstone.
Then you realize the power of {{item:3361}}.
that's all ap supports need unless you really want a sweeper
I've probably been reported a few times for not buying a sightstone and instead upgrading my trinket. People dont realize how fast you can barf out wards with that thing.

I'd personally rather suggest you take Sightstone and the Purple upgrade for maximum ward barfage

but either's good frankly
I bet he's just having a "bad game".
Well, at least it's a step up from "GG, report our support, 0/9 scrub" while discounting the 15+ assists.

I mean, 0/9/15 isn't that great lol. It would be like going 6/9/9. 9 deaths is a lot of deaths. Don't give me the "supports are supposed to die", because they aren't lol. It is acceptable for them to die if it creates a bigger play, yes, but not "supposed to die". I have had many supports die like 10 times in the game and "lolz nuub im suppo im suppposed to die scrub".
In facts, supports like Janna or Sona are supposed to not die.
Shinobu best grill confirmed?
0/0/23{{champion:40}} support god
If I had a ward for every time I heard that one... I'd have have so many sightstones...
Was the support afk and warding the spawn fountain?

Wait I'm confused, is that an insult?

Pretty lame attempt at an insult imo...
I'd honor that so much. Even if I was the enemy support.
If I'm getting internet troubles, this is what I do. Just build sightstone and sweeper and buy pinks and generally just try to be useful like that. It's actually quite effective.
yeah I had a new one yesterday as well. I was told that supports have no place in league. I was 1/8/40 and told that I did nothing but feed the entire game. XD
XD +1
i stopped building pure ward supports since nautilus infinte tank bot support.

I played a game fairly recently as Zyra support, but I had really bad connection issues.  As a result, I was useless except for warding early on, and I couldn't even defend myself or my ADC.  Fortunately my team kept themselves together, got our Jinx fed, and the enemies were really disorganized.  I got a sightstone, mobility boots, pink wards, and when I finally hit level 9, an oracle lens.  Somehow I got some assists and was able to build a Banner of Command.

Basically all I was good for that game was warding, clearing wards, and promoting a minion every so often to push a side lane.  But somehow it all worked out and my team won the game.
Well they obviously know how to play supp then.
I'm just saying guys but if u ever do troll as support actually any champ. Buy 6 sight stones and press 1-6 rapidly omg so many wards placed at once ( you have to be in fountain or it doesn't work )
